title: Swarna Kamalalu: Emerald & Ruby Gold Stud Earrings
features: Inspired by the lotus flower, these handcrafted earrings feature a central oval cut emerald surrounded by delicate golden petals adorned with sparkling CZs and contrasted with vibrant round rubies. The openwork design provides light and movement, enhancing the brilliance of the gemstones. Features a secure screw-back closure.
colors: and rich red from the rubies.
occasions: Perfect for casual outings or special occasions such as kitty parties
or a modern twist on a traditional look for a half-saree function.
description: These elegant earrings offer a contemporary take on traditional South Indian jewelry. The high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and durability. The vibrant gemstone combination adds a touch of opulence, while the comfortable design makes them perfect for everyday wear. The secure screw-back closure provides peace of mind.
